title: Heartseeker Quinn recall bug.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: this is also happened multiple times throughout the game, the next game I played phoenix quinn and the recall worked perfectly fine.

replies.body:
Hey kagepaladin! 

Thanks for the report! We've figured out what's causing this, and should have a fix in soon. :)
cool thank you, although it is neat watching it, the meme potential would've been great with AxelF's crazy frog video XD
